ygData.subject: Re: Kick Ass Wiz Robe
ygData.msgSnippet: Fake one, comfirm by Verant some time back.
ygData.messageBody:
Fake one, comfirm by Verant some time back.

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> can be sure if this is done by a quest... it certainly got omething to do
> with plane of fear... n screw up all ya faction... good or bad...
>
> ----- Original Message -----

> To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
